synopsis.text: Federation of Nations has ushered in an era of tranquility following the downfall of Britannia's notorious emperor. However, this harmony is disrupted when former princess Nunnally vi Britannia and Suzaku Kururugi, the chief advisor of the Black Knights, are abducted by militants, leading to an international crisis. Suspicions fall on the unpredictable Kingdom of Zilkhstan, prompting a covert investigation led by Kallen Stadtfeld and her team. Amidst the chaos, they cross paths with the immortal sorceress C.C., who harbors a secret mission: to revive the mastermind behind history's most significant revolution. As the world teeters on the brink of turmoil, the stage is set for the return of a legendary figure who once sacrificed everything to restore peace. Will this resurrected hero rise to the occasion and safeguard the world once more? The answer lies within the enigmatic intentions of C.C. and the people of Zilkhstan royal palace, who possess knowledge about the powerful force known as Geass.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
